title: Typophile type designers
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20150406023552/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Designers](http://web.archive.org/web/20150406023552/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Designers) : Typophile Regulars**

Following is a list of designers who are  
 1) alive,  
 2) participants on typophile,\*  
 3) have fonts commercially available.

[Tim Ahrens](http://web.archive.org/web/20150406023552/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Tim%20Ahrens): [Tim Ahrens](http://web.archive.org/web/20150406023552/http:/typophile.com/user/4763)
